text: Nadella () is a surname native to Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. Nadella surname is found among Telugu-speaking Brahmin community of Haritasa gotra. ==Notable people== Notable people with the surname include: *Satya Nadella (born 19 August 1967) - CEO of Microsoft *Nadella Purushottama Kavi (1863 - 1938) - Indian scholar, playwright, teacher and editor. *Nadella Nandagopal (1934 - 2018) - Indian film journalist, editor and critic. ==See also== * Nadellaa ==References==
title: Nadella (surname)
